name: Unmoored: Post-Apocalyptic Nautical Navigation
description:
Build a convoy of ships in a flooded post-apocalyptic city! Connection is key to survival as you scrounge for food among shark-infested waters. The larger your convoy, the higher your score!

How to play:

- W/S to move forward/back, A/D to turn the boat

- Click on boats in range to drag them to your convoy. There is a minimum and maximum distance for attaching new ships.

- Ships increase your score. The more ships you have at the end of the game, the higher your score.

- Drive over food to pick it up. Food decreases your hunger bar. When hunger reaches maximum, the game ends.

- Sharks will attack your ships, sinking them. Ships formerly attached to sunk ships will need to be re-acquired.
